lines.speaker: Winston
lines.zh: 小A啊，今天看你额头青了一块，怎么受伤了呢？
lines.en: Amalgamia, how come you have a bruise on your forehead? Did you hit something?

lines.speaker: A
lines.zh: 竟然有这么明显吗！昨晚没太睡好，今早晕晕的。一不小心头磕到火车的门上了。。。
lines.en: Is it that obvious? I didn’t sleep well last night and felt kinda dizzy this morning. Accidentally bumped my head on the train door...

lines.speaker: Winston
lines.zh: 要当心啊！今天不是很忙，要不你早点下班回去补补觉吧！
lines.en: Omg.. be careful! It looks like a quiet day today, perhaps go home early to take some rest?
